briefTitle: Metformin Add-on Study in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (0431-020)(COMPLETED)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Hemoglobin A1C (A1C) at Week 24
outcomeMeasures.description:
A1C is measured as a percent. Thus, this change from

baseline reflects the Week 24 A1C percent minus the Week 0 A1C percent.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Fasting Plasma Glucose (FPG) at Week 24
outcomeMeasures.description:
Change from baseline at Week 24 is defined as FPG at

Week 24 minus FPG at Week 0.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in 2-hour Post-meal Glucose (PMG) at Week 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline at Week 24 is defined as PMG at Week 24 minus PMG at Week 0.
